name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Malcolm GANTZ, Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Malcolm GANTZ, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 9th day of September, 2009, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal Nunc Pro Tune is GRANTED. See Pa.R.Crim.P. 122(B) (defendant has a right to a counsel-filed Petition for Allowance of Appeal). Counsel is directed to file a Petition for Allowance of Appeal within 30 days of this order.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
981 A.2d 1278
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Malcolm GANTZ, Petitioner.
No. 106 EM 2009.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Sept. 9, 2009.
